update sys_dict

update sys_dict set value = #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, label = #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, themes = #{themes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, enable = #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where `key` = #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from sys_dict where type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by sort

select
from sys_dict where del_flag!=1
AND `key` LIKE CONCAT('%','${key}','%')
AND label LIKE CONCAT('%','${label}','%')
AND type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by sort
select type from sys_dict group by type
